picked_headlines.summary: CudaForge optimizes CUDA kernels with a multi-agent framework, boosting speed and correctness.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article presents a significant advancement in CUDA kernel optimization, relevant for both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in performance improvements.

picked_headlines.summary: AI reshapes data engineering, but human expertise remains crucial for infrastructure and data quality.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This topic is crucial for understanding the evolving role of AI in engineering and management, highlighting the balance between automation and human expertise.

digest:
- *CudaForge* introduces a multi-agent framework for CUDA kernel optimization, achieving high correctness and speedup over existing methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.01884)
- *TabTune* unifies workflows for tabular foundation models, enhancing preprocessing, fine-tuning, and evaluation for better deployment. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.02802)
- *PerfDojo* automates ML library generation for diverse architectures using LLMs and RL, enhancing performance without prior hardware knowledge. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.03586)
- *RAGalyst* offers a new framework for evaluating domain-specific RAG systems, enhancing alignment with human judgment and addressing context-dependency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04502)
- *Data Engineering in the Age of AI* discusses AI's impact on data engineering, emphasizing the continued need for human expertise. [Read more](https://www.oreilly.com/radar/data-engineering-in-the-age-of-ai/)
- *Amazon layoffs* raise questions about AI's role in job cuts amidst economic changes, highlighting the intersection of technology and employment. [Read more](https://blog.pragmaticengineer.com/the-pulse-amazon-layoffs/)
- *AnalogSeeker* is an open-source model for analog circuit design, enhancing training with domain knowledge and achieving notable accuracy improvements. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.10409)
- *LiveTradeBench* evaluates LLMs in real-time trading, revealing gaps in static tests and highlighting decision-making under uncertainty. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.03628)
- *EEGReXferNet* is a lightweight AI framework for efficient EEG reconstruction using cross-subject learning, enhancing real-time BCI applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.02848)
